Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne nishiina shilakhumanyia mbu nishina shikhong’ondanga
Inyanga	yabandu	baliba	shinga tsimburukuru tsisaalanibwe
Ne tsinguli tsiliba shinga ipamba isakhululwe
Kho ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshisiro
Ne ulia weshichelo shishie shiliba eshiangu
Oyo eshimenyo shishie shiliba mumulilo kwa Hawiya
Ne nishina shikhumanyisia mbu nishina esho
